RelatedSentence: The Times announced last week that she was being replaced by managing editor Dean Baquet .
Abramson was the first woman to hold the newspaper 's highest editorial position .
She spent more than two years in the job .
She joined the newspaper in 1997 after working for nearly a decade at The Wall Street Journal .
